title: Night of the one night stands
description: What looked like a fun night out with friends, ended up to be a bizarre rendition of Meg's past. Her past one nights stands, to be clearâ€¦ Is she meant to be with one of her past flings? Is the Universe conspiring? Or is it just her friends? A debut novella by Maaike Molenaar.
author: Maaike Molenaar
